description: Kouno Yui works as librarian at the Girls` School. The http://anidb.net/ch40657 [girls in the library] are always crowded around pictures, or a boom box talking about or listening to http://anidb.net/ch5895 [Kyouta]. Yui seems interested in Kyouta, but still lectures her students to keep quiet and not enjoy his music in the library.
name: Kouno Yui
